description: Factor level shows annual nitrogen fertilizer treatment

Factor level shows annual nitrogen fertilizer treatment. From 1877 split into two equal amounts and applied in spring on two occasions. From 1882 N4 applied only on alternate years, see notes 1 and 2 which relate to plots 8 and 9.  From 1907 N4 treatment reduced to  N2.
Factor level shows annual nitrogen fertilizer treatment. From 1907 applied on alternate years to plots 8 and 9. From 1907 N2 treatment reduced to N1.
Factor level shows annual nitrogen fertilizer treatment. Previously applied as N2 1877-1906.

Factor level shows annual nitrogen fertilizer treatment. From 1877 split into two equal amounts and applied in spring on two occasions. From 1882 N4 applied only on alternate years, see notes 1 and 2 which relate to plots 8 and 9.  From 1907 N4* treatment reduced to  N2*
Factor level shows annual nitrogen fertilizer treatment. From 1907 applied on alternate years to plots 8 and 9. From 1907 N2* treatment reduced to N1*.
Factor level shows annual nitrogen fertilizer treatment. Previously applied as N2* 1877-1906.
